name: Heat Resistant 932°F Soldering Mat, Large Anti-static Mat, Electronic Repair Desk Mat, Silicone Work Mat, Mat for Mobile Phones, Computers and other Electronic Equipment Repair 17.7'' *11.8 ''
short_description: 1️⃣ 【Professional 932°F Heat-Resistant Soldering Mat】Crafted from premium silicone, this mat withstands extreme heat up to 932°F (500°C), allowing direct soldering on its surface. 3️⃣【Stable & Easy-Maintain Surface】 The silicone material is smooth and odor-free, with a non-slip base to keep it secure. Cleanup is quick and hassle-free. Its durable, foldable design holds its shape well, making it a handy choice for DIY projects and workshops.

4️⃣ 【Large Multi-Purpose Workspace】17.7"x11.8" (45x30cm) surface accommodates phones, laptops, smartwatches, and more. Doubles as an electronics assembly station and crafting mat—maximizing efficiency for all your projects.

5️⃣ 【Lifetime Warranty & Pro-Grade Tool】Includes 11 screwdriver slots and magnetic zones for securing BGA chips. Backed by 180-day returns + lifetime warranty with 24/7 support. The ultimate gift for engineers and must-have workstation upgrade.

name: Anti Static Mat ESD Table Mat Kit – 17”x25” Workbench Grounding Mat with Terminal Ground Cord & Adjustable Wrist Strap for Electronics Repair, Soldering, PC, Circuit Boards (Blue)
short_description: ✅ BUILT FOR ESD SAFETY – Dual-Layer Material Structure : Features a static-dissipative blue surface and a conductive black base layer. Helps safely redirect static electricity during electronics repair tasks

🔧 READY TO USE – Ground Cord + Adjustable Wrist Strap Included : Includes a 6ft ring-terminal ground cord and a 10ft adjustable Velcro wrist strap. Clip the strap to your wrist and attach the terminal to a grounded screw—no special adapter needed

📏 SPACIOUS & FLEXIBLE – 17"x25" Anti-Static Surface : Provides 425 square inches of coverage, perfect for laptops, circuit boards, and soldering projects. The durable rubber-PVC blend resists curling and stays stable on your workbench

🧤 BEGINNER-FRIENDLY – Quick Setup Tips : The mat may arrive slightly curled—simply reverse-roll it or flatten it under a heavy object for 24 hours. A mild rubber scent may occur and will fade after 2–3 days in a ventilated room

🌿 WELL-MADE FOR TECH USE – Durable & Workshop-Friendly : Made with materials widely used in electronics environments. The surface is smooth, easy to clean, and performs reliably in repair shops, classrooms, and home workbenches

short_description: ESD Safety Anti-static mat ：This is a high-quality ESD repair mat. The resistivity of the mat is 10⁶ Ω, which can effectively prevent the generation and accumulation of static electricity, control the generation of static electricity, and quickly lead the generated static electricity into the ground wire, reducing the risk of electrostatic breakdown of electronic products and providing a safer and better working environment for the assembly, repair or soldering of sensitive electronic products

Keep your platform clean : Our silicone soldering mat are 15.75 "x 11" (40 cm x 28 cm), which provides ample space for various maintenance projects. solder mat are designed to provide built-in scale, 240 screw areas, 10 parts areas and 2 welding wire rosin areas through simple design, thus enhancing your maintenance. These functions make it easy for you to classify IC chips, small parts and screws, improve your work efficiency and keep your maintenance platform clean

Heat-Resistant Silicone mat : made of high-quality soft silicone, our engineering mat can withstand temperatures as high as 932 ℉ (500 ℃). This ensures that your maintenance platform is protected from high temperature burning and damage. You can weld directly on the mat with a soldering iron without worrying about damaging the surface. The solder pad is non-slip, easy to clean, corrosion-resistant, not easy to deform and is easy to fold or roll up for storage.

ESD accessories for grounding : Kaisi ESD maintenance pad contains a set of ESD accessories.it includes grounding plug, grounding wire and ESD wrist strap. These ESD accessories are very convenient for you to connect the anti-static mat to the ground. When static electricity is generated, it can quickly introduce static charge into the ground, providing a stable and reliable maintenance platform for maintenance personnel, ensuring the integrity of electronic equipment

Widely used: whether you are welding electronic components or repairing circuit boards, mobile phones, laptops, computers, sports watches, cameras, smart toys, or raspberry PI DIY hobby, this kind of ESD work mat will meet all your needs

name: iFixit Portable Anti-Static Mat - ESD Pad, Wrist Strap, Grounding Cord for Electronics Repair
short_description: SAFE: This high-quality antistatic mat protects electronics & components from damage caused by static discharge.
FUNCTIONAL: This mat can be easily folded, wrapped and transported. Your sensitive electronics are protected at all times - whether you work from home or somewhere else.
SIMPLE: Connect the mat to a ground (e.g. heater) and place the bracelet on your wrist. Place the case and components on the mat and your electronics are protected from ESD.

IFIXIT QUALITY: This antistatic mat is made of nylon and polymer and complies with the standards ESD S4.1 and ESD S20.20. It is provided with a protective layer for additional protection. Covered by iFixit's Lifetime Warranty.
FACTS: Surface Resistivity: 10^7 - 10^9 Ω, 10 mm Grounding Snap, 1.8 m 50 Ω Wrist Strap adjustable to XL, 1.8 m 10^5 Ω Grounding Cord, Dimensions: 60 cm x 60 cm.

name: StarTech.com Anti-Static Mat - 25” x 27.5” Electrical Grounding Desk Pad - For Home or Work - Beige, TAA (M3013)
short_description: PROTECT EQUIPMENT: Unlike conductive systems, this static dissipative mat protects your most sensitive equipment from static damage
LOW PROFILE: Only 0.1" (0.2 cm) thick, this anti-static rubber mat sits comfortably under your desk equipment, whether at home or work
TOP SPECIFICATIONS MET: This electrical grounding mat is designed to meet the highest specifications, including IBM and US military static control standards
ADD ADDITONAL PROTECTION: Add additional protection by also using our anti-static wrist strap (SWS100)
CONVENIENT SIZE: Measuring 24" x 27.5", this ESD pad is perfectly sized to fit your CPU/VDT and keyboard
product_description: Protect Equipment anti-static mat helps you protect your valuable computer equipment from dangerous static electricity. This high quality anti-static mat is constructed from the highest quality static dissipative material, to ensure safe operation of your equipment. High Quality the electrical grounding mat meets IBM and US military static control standards and measures 24” x 27.5”, making it perfect for placement under the CPU/VDT and keyboard. Convenient Size Designed to sit comfortably under your desk equipment, this ESD pad protects your electronics without being bulky or interfering with daily work. The mat is also beige, blending in with most desk or table surfaces. This anti-static rubber mat is backed by a 2-year warranty and free lifetime technical support.
